about_the_game:
You embark on a journey of survival after stumbling upon a mysterious book during a routine flight. The unassuming tome, filled with detailed chapters on various phobias, proves to be a gateway to a nightmarish reality.

Once you select a chapter from the book, you're thrust into immersive and spine-chilling scenarios, each representing a different phobia. You must navigate treacherous environments and face your deepest fears.
